credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Sketches for a Ceiling Painting: The Triumphant Church
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash; verso: black chalk on cream laid paper
description:
A woman in the attire of a Pope is seated on clouds and supports the mantle of a church, together with angels. A dove flies above her; more angels are attendant at right. The woman addresses herself to the kneeling "Strength," while "Abundance" gazes up to her. Angels and an escutcheon are shown in the lower center. 
Verso: rough sketch; "Abundance" seems to be seated beside the Church. An angel flies beside the lower part of the kneeling figure of "Strength."
name: Drawing
